Rex Garner bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi a mụrụ na Britain

A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1921 na Wolverhampton, England. Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 17 ọnwa Mee afọ 2015 mgbe ọ dị afọ 94. Ụmụ asaa hapụrụ Garner: Nicolas Garner, Lindsay Garner, Christopher Garner, Geraldine Raper (onye a mụrụ Garner) Sally Garner-Gibbons, Kerry Garner, na Kim Garner, yana nwunye mbụ ya Tammy Garner
N'etiti ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ya na British TV, ọ sonyeere na My Wife and I
N'afọ 1968 ọ gara South Africa iji sonye na Academy Theatre, wee biri ebe ahụ n'afọ 1974
N'afọ 1979, ọ sonyeere Pieter Toerien na-eme ihe nkiri ma na-eduzi ihe nkiri ruo n'afọ 1999
N'afọ 1981 ọ bụ onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri Tommie Meyer "Birds of Paradise"
Ọ laghachiri na UK na mbido afọ 2000.
A kpọrọ ya onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma n'afọ 1983 na Fleur du Cap Theatre Awards maka ọrụ ya dịka  Nna Tim na Mass Appeal
